name: whop-streaks
description: A gamified streak tracker to boost user engagement and retention. Users log daily actions to earn badges and rewards, competing on leaderboards. This application uses a dark, cosmic theme with vibrant gradients.

scripts.start: echo "Start script is not applicable in this environment. Use your deployment platform's start command."
scripts.build: echo "Build script is not applicable in this environment. Use your deployment platform's build command."
scripts.dev: echo "To run this app, serve the project root directory with a static file server. For example: 'npx serve .' or 'python3 -m http.server'"
